DOC.brief_title: The Use of Sunscreen Starting on the First Day After Ablative Fractional Skin Resurfacing
DOC.detailed_description: - The use of sunscreen on the first day after fractional ablative skin resurfacing may reduce the risk of post-inflammatory hyperpigmentation (PIH) - Therefore, we conducted the study to evaluate the efficacy of the use of sunscreen on the first day after fractional ablative skin resurfacing in reducing the risk of PIH.
DOC.criteria: Patients who want to receive fractional ablative laser resurfacing for acne scars Pregnancy Lactation Age < 18
